cards.note: Every time I see your smile, my heart does a little dance. It is the sweetest thing. Don't lose your smile! ...pleasee
I don't get why this picture is here butt thank you for the amusing amusement park.
Nwaoma! looking hottie hottie. Agbani Darego!
Looking at these pictures, I see HER! you are HER
That smile...Oh my God. I am gladd.
Thank you for making ordinary days feel like magic. I can't count the number of days you have made feel like magic. I am really grateful.
HER! You didn't take pictures this day. Anyway, this leg go carry you go places in Jesus name.
Putting smiles on my face since 1970. Thank you Maris.
Snapchat Baddie/Distinction candidate. I am rooting for you and I want you to know that.
Snapchat baddie left the chat...heheheheh!. This one is the distinction candidate Maris

This has to be one of my favorite images of you. It is very nostalgic. I want to be inside the picture with you at this moment anytime i look at it. I can feel the energy from the image. These are the moments I look at and I am grateful that i met you, Maris. Happy Valentines Day.
